Package modele

Class Character

java.lang.Object
modele.Occupant
modele.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Moveable, Questionable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cheater, Hunter, WiseMan
public abstract class Character extends Occupant implements Moveable
A character is an occupant that can move. It has a direction and a temporary direction. The possible directions are: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 0 beeing right and the other directions going counter-clockwise.
